Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A/H5 Subtyping Kit
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Reagents for detection of specific novel influenza A viruses
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems (ABI) 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A/H5 Subtyping Kit for presumptive detection and surveillance of influenza A/H5 (Asian lineage) in human respiratory specimens and viral culture
Indications for Use Summary: For presumptive identification of influenza A subtype A/H5 (Asian lineage) in patients from viral RNA in human respiratory specimens and viral culture, and to provide epidemiologic information for surveillance of circulating influenza viruses
